title: Question 24
prompt:
Sentence 11: Casual business dress is acceptable on Tuesdays and Wednesdays.

Which is the best revision of sentence 11?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
In this sentence the prepositional phrase “on Tuesdays and Wednesdays” tells the reader something about the whole sentence. It does not just modify the subject or object of the sentence. Because this prepositional phrase modifies the whole idea that “casual business dress is acceptable,” it is best located either at the beginning of the sentence or at the end of the sentence. The correct choice moves the prepositional phrase to the beginning of the sentence and keeps the modified idea “casual business dress is acceptable” together.


On Tuesdays and Wednesdays, casual business dress is acceptable.
